title: Science and Project Adviser (SEO) and Science and Project Officer (HEO)

content.text: Are you a scientist or engineer who wants to apply your expertise and experience to an exciting, fast-paced and varied role?
If so, we would love to hear from you!

The two roles are based in the Chief Scientific Adviser’s (CSA) Office in the Department for Energy Security & Net Zero (DESNZ) and part of the newly formed Science Strategy, Policy and Emerging Technologies team. We are looking for a highly motivated individual to support the team delivering a new science function within the CSA Office, working at the heart of the science system in DESNZ. The post will support the delivery of science and evidence to underpin Departmental input into cross-Whitehall discussions and decisions on the Government’s Science Policy. This work spans across areas including emerging technologies such as AI, Quantum and Engineering biology, as well as other high-priority policy areas that have important overlaps with the Department’s priorities, such as Space and Critical Minerals.
For more information, including the full job description and how to apply, please see Civil Service jobs webpage for the Science and Project Adviser (SEO) and Science and Project Officer (HEO).
Apply before 11:55 pm on Wednesday 29th November 2023
